Papers Writing Notes Podcast

You can subscribe by email to receive occasional1 updates about new essays. I’ll send you things I’ve written and possibly a few other findings worth ingesting.

No spam and you can unsubscribe at any time. It will cause only minor amounts of existential horror on my end.

  1. Probably something like bi-monthly with a standard deviation of a few months … ↩︎
